insert into saas_purchase_in_storage_detail (enterprise_id, parent_id, in_storage_id, order_type, in_storage_code, in_storage_date, base_order_dtl_id, base_order_id, base_order_type, base_order_code, base_order_date, goods_id, goods_code, barcode, goods_name, goods_generic_name, dosage_id, dosage_name, unit_id, unit_name, goods_specification, manufacturer_id, manufacturer, goods_place, approval_number, quantity, unit_price, line_discount, amount, whole_discount, line_discount_amount, real_price, real_amount, tax_rate_id, tax_rate, notax_real_price, notax_real_amount, tax_amount, unclear_quantity, clear_quantity, line_num, status, remark, creater_id, creater_code, creater_name, create_time, modifier_id, modifier_code, modifier_name, update_time, purchase_order_id, purchase_order_dtl_id) values
(#{item.enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.inStorageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.inStorageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.select:
select
from saas_purchase_in_storage_detail where goods_id = #{goodsId} order by in_storage_date desc limit 1

select dtl.id , dtl.enterprise_id , dtl.parent_id , dtl.in_storage_id , dtl.order_type , dtl.in_storage_code , dtl.in_storage_date , dtl.base_order_dtl_id , dtl.base_order_id , dtl.base_order_type , dtl.base_order_code , dtl.base_order_date , dtl.goods_id , dtl.goods_code , dtl.barcode , dtl.goods_name , dtl.goods_generic_name , dtl.dosage_id , dtl.dosage_name , dtl.unit_id , dtl.unit_name , dtl.goods_specification , dtl.manufacturer_id , dtl.manufacturer , dtl.goods_place , dtl.approval_number , dtl.quantity , dtl.unit_price , dtl.line_discount , dtl.amount , dtl.whole_discount , dtl.line_discount_amount , dtl.real_price , dtl.real_amount , dtl.tax_rate_id , dtl.tax_rate , dtl.notax_real_price , dtl.notax_real_amount , dtl.tax_amount , dtl.unclear_quantity , dtl.clear_quantity , dtl.line_num , dtl.STATUS , dtl.remark , dtl.creater_id , dtl.creater_code , dtl.creater_name , dtl.create_time , dtl.modifier_id , dtl.modifier_code , dtl.modifier_name , dtl.update_time , dtl.purchase_order_id , dtl.purchase_order_dtl_id from saas_purchase_in_storage_detail dtl JOIN saas_stock stock on stock.goods_id = dtl.goods_id and stock.enterprise_id = dtl.enterprise_id
left join saas_lot_number lot on lot.id=stock.lot_id left join saas_warehouse_shelf ws on ws.id=stock.shelf_id left join saas_warehouse_cargo_area wca on wca.id=ws.cargo_area_id
where dtl.in_storage_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND stock.goods_id = lot.goods_id AND stock.inventory_status = 0 AND stock.usable_quantity>0 AND wca.job_type=0 and wca.job_area=0 AND date_format(lot.valid_until, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY dtl.id
